children.markdown:
[![](https://i0.wp.com/static.flickr.com/24/42808677_7fd1a7a7ce.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/42808677/ "photo sharing") [Lewisham roadworks](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/42808677/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
What great timing some people have. Just as the roads get busy after the summer break, the road through the heart of Lewisham is about to be dug up. Ah, well, soon we won’t have any petrol to drive down the dug-up streets. {I’m not sure the generators running those signs are doing much for Lewisham’s commitment to protecting the environment, either.)
